mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo} AND ( COMMENTDELETED is null OR COMMENTDELETED = 0 )

SELECT b.boardNo , e.empId , b.boardTitle , b.boardContent , b.boardWriteDate , b.boardUpdateDate , b.boardHitcount , b.boardDeleted , bt.boardTypeName , bt.inquiryBoardType , e.empName , e.empRank , t.teamNo , t.teamName , m.mediaFileData FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN BOARDTYPE bt ON b.BOARDTYPENO = bt.BOARDTYPENO INNER JOIN EMP e ON b.EMPID = e.EMPID INNER JOIN EMPINFO ei ON e.EMPID = ei.EMPID LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM t ON ei.TEAMNO = t.TEAMNO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDIAFILE m ON ei.EMPID = m.EMPID WHERE 1=1 AND b.BOARDNO = #{boardNo} AND ( b.BOARDDELETED = 0 OR b.BOARDDELETED is null ) AND m.MEDIAFILENAME like '%Profile' AND rownum = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDHITCOUNT = BOARDHITCOUNT + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDHITCOUNT = BOARDHITCOUNT - 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDCOMMENT ( COMMENTNO , EMPID , BOARDNO , COMMENTCONTENT , COMMENTWRITEDATE , COMMENTDELETED ) VALUES ( COMMENTNO_SEQ.nextval , #{empId} , #{boardNo} , #{commentContent} , sysdate , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT c.commentNo , e.empId , c.boardNo , c.commentContent , c.commentWriteDate , c.commentUpdateDate , c.commentDeleted , e.empName , e.empRank , t.teamNo , t.teamName , m.mediaFileData FROM BOARDCOMMENT c INNER JOIN EMP e ON c.EMPID = e.EMPID INNER JOIN EMPINFO ei ON e.EMPID = ei.EMPID LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM t ON ei.TEAMNO = t.TEAMNO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEDIAFILE m ON ei.EMPID = m.EMPID WHERE 1=1 AND c.BOARDNO = #{boardNo} AND ( COMMENTDELETED = 0 OR COMMENTDELETED is null ) AND m.MEDIAFILENAME like '%Profile' ORDER BY COMMENTWRITEDATE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDDELETED = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARDCOMMENT SET COMMENTDELETED = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND COMMENTNO = #{commentNo}
